com.aionemu.gameserver.network.aion
Class AionConnection

java.lang.Object
  com.aionemu.commons.network.AConnection
      com.aionemu.gameserver.network.aion.AionConnection

public class AionConnection
extends AConnection

Object representing connection between GameServer and Aion Client.

Author:
-Nemesiss-

Method Detail

enableCryptKey

public final int enableCryptKey()
Enable crypt key - generate random key that will be used to encrypt second server packet [first one is unencrypted] and decrypt client packets. This method is called from SM_KEY server packet, that packet sends key to aion client.

Returns:
"false key" that should by used by aion client to encrypt/decrypt packets.

processData

protected final boolean processData(java.nio.ByteBuffer data)
Called by Dispatcher. ByteBuffer data contains one packet that should be processed.

Specified by:
processData in class AConnection
Parameters:
data -
Returns:
True if data was processed correctly, False if some error occurred and connection should be closed NOW.

writeData

protected final boolean writeData(java.nio.ByteBuffer data)
This method will be called by Dispatcher, and will be repeated till return false.

Specified by:
writeData in class AConnection
Parameters:
data -
Returns:
True if data was written to buffer, False indicating that there are not any more data to write.

getDisconnectionDelay

protected final long getDisconnectionDelay()
This method is called by Dispatcher when connection is ready to be closed.

Specified by:
getDisconnectionDelay in class AConnection
Returns:
time in ms after witch onDisconnect() method will be called. Always return 0.

onDisconnect

protected final void onDisconnect()
This method is called by Dispatcher to inform that this connection was closed and should be cleared. This method is called only once.

Specified by:
onDisconnect in class AConnection

onServerClose

protected final void onServerClose()
This method is called by NioServer to inform that NioServer is shouting down. This method is called only once.

Specified by:
onServerClose in class AConnection

Parameters:

close

public final void close(AionServerPacket closePacket,
                        boolean forced)
Its guaranted that closePacket will be sent before closing connection, but all past and future packets wont. Connection will be closed [by Dispatcher Thread], and onDisconnect() method will be called to clear all other things. forced means that server shouldn't wait with removing this connection.

Parameters:
closePacket - Packet that will be send before closing.
forced - have no effect in this implementation.
